tool_description: Checks for price changes in the runescape market pricing data. This is for Runescape (RS3) not Classic Runescape.
name: Runescape RS3 Price Market Watch Item Data
title: Runescape RS3 Price Market Watch Item Data
tool_name: Runescape RS3 Price Market Watch Item Data

api_list.name: RS3 Items: Search Any Field
api_list.description:
search category title, change category to field name to search
search from fields available replace category with field name and search_value=value with the search value.

change item_id to an available field and then the search value 
e.g: /rs3_items/search_list/item_id/?search_value=3022
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://runescape-rs3-price-market-watch-item-data.p.rapidapi.com/rs3_items/search_list/item_id/?search_value=3022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "runescape-rs3-price-market-watch-item-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: RS3 prices: Search Any Field
api_list.description:
search category title, change category to field name to search search from fields available replace category with field name and search_value=value with the search value. RS3 prices

change the item_id to an available field and then the search_value = to the .. search value required.  
e.g: /rs3_prices/search_list/item_id/?search_value=11726
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://runescape-rs3-price-market-watch-item-data.p.rapidapi.com/rs3_prices/search_list/item_id/?search_value=11726"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "runescape-rs3-price-market-watch-item-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: RS3 prices: List all fields from multiple items
api_list.description: Pass in multiple items into this search and return results from RS3 prices. max = number items to return.

api_list.name: RS3 prices: Distinct List of Any Field Values
api_list.description: for example if you want to get a distinct list of categories that exist from RS3 prices. this should show a distinct list in json array.

api_list.name: RS3 prices: Latest 50 - 100 Items
api_list.description: show the latest items from the range starting at 50 and showing 100 items from RS3 prices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://runescape-rs3-price-market-watch-item-data.p.rapidapi.com/rs3_prices/latest/50/100/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "runescape-rs3-price-market-watch-item-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
